content.raw:
I got past the submodules issue by putting everything into a single git repo, so there are no submodules.  So this is a different issue from that.

I wonder if it has to do with the way that I am entering the private key into cloudsim. It seems odd to just copy and paste all that text onto that short line.  For example, maybe line feeds are inserted from my text editor. Any chance that it is looking for a filename to upload or something like that?
content.html:
I got past the submodules issue by putting everything into a single git repo, so there are no submodules. So this is a different issue from that.

I wonder if it has to do with the way that I am entering the private key into cloudsim. It seems odd to just copy and paste all that text onto that short line. For example, maybe line feeds are inserted from my text editor. Any chance that it is looking for a filename to upload or something like that?
